imdb.title: Bishôjo senshi Sêrâ Mûn
imdb.plot: A group of schoolgirls discover they are incarnations of super-powered alien princesses, and use their abilities to defend the earth.

episodes.title: A Nightmare Scatters the Flowers! Return of the Dark Queen
episodes.plot: As Usagi and her friends begin high school, a mysterious force releases Queen Nehellenia from her mirror, encouraging her to take revenge on them.

episodes.title: Sataan no mezame! Seeraa 10 senshi shuuketsu
episodes.plot: While Queen Nehellenia continues to exert her evil influence on the earth, the rapidly aging Hotaru re-awakens as Sailor Saturn.

episodes.title: Evil Mirror Under a Curse! Mamoru in a Nightmare Trap
episodes.plot: People all around Tokyo, including Mamoru, become entranced by mirrors. Usagi remembers a shadow she saw in Mamoru's mirror, and races off with the other soldiers to find him.

episodes.title: Unmei no ichiya! Seeraa senshi no kunan
episodes.plot: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted right before her very eyes. To make matters worse, Nehelenia's action is starting to cause a time paradox, which threatens to end Chibiusa's existence.

episodes.title: Ai Yueni! Hateshinaki makai no tatakai
episodes.plot: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehelina alone. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but one by one they fall victim to Nehelina's traps.

episodes.title: Moon Love Power! The End of the Nightmare
episodes.plot: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehelinia's palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. But despite their best efforts, the two Guardians are unable to free him, and Sailor Chibi Moon fades from existence.

episodes.title: Wakare to deai! Unmei no hoshiboshi no ruten
episodes.plot: Mamoru tells Usagi that he's accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship. Saddened at first, Usagi eventually decides to root for her boyfriend's dream and sends him off with a smile.

episodes.title: Gakuen ni fuku arashi! Tenkosei wa aidoru
episodes.plot: Usagi runs into Seiya again and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, she is surprised to find that Seiya and the rest of the Three Lights have transferred to her school.

episodes.title: Aidoru wo mezase! Minako no yabo
episodes.plot: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant thinking it will help her quickly get into the entertainment industry. But Minkao soon realizes that being a star isn't all fun and glamor.

episodes.title: Faita no shotai! Shogeki no chohenshin
episodes.plot: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical, which they will be starring in. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director, especially Seiya, who feels that he is being personally tested.

episodes.title: Hoshi ni takusu yume to roman! Taiki no henshin
episodes.plot: Ami invited Taiki to come and watch the Wataru's Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher, Amanogawa, only to be rejected.

episodes.title: Luna wa mita!? Aidoru yaten no sugao
episodes.plot: Yaten temporarily adopts Luna.

episodes.title: Teki? Mikata? Sutaraitsu to sera senshi
episodes.plot: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.

episodes.title: Yobiau hoshi no kagayaki! haruka-tachi sansen
episodes.plot: Usagi and the girls try to buy tockets to a Three Lights concert, only to learn it is already sold out. Michiru then passes by and gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be performing with the Three Lights.

episodes.title: Seiya to Usagi no doki-doki deto
episodes.plot: Seiya asks Usagi on a date, to which she reluctantly agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya's star seed.

episodes.title: Uchu kara no shinyaku! Seiren hirai
episodes.plot: Usagi and Lina encounters a little girl who appears to be lost. The two later return home that day and are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi's house as her younger sister.

episodes.title: Shiryo no sakebi? Kyofu kyampu no kaijin
episodes.plot: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.

episodes.title: Futarikiri no yoru! Usagi no pinchi
episodes.plot: When Usagi is home alone, she invites Seiya over. The other Senshi and some surprise visitors show up as well!

episodes.title: Taiki zessho! Shinjiru kokoro wo uta ni komete
episodes.plot: Taiki begins to question if their activity as the Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess. His frustration continues to grow, to the point where he no longer feels like singing.

episodes.title: Chibi Chibi's Mystery? The Big Noisy Chase
episodes.plot: Lately, Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with a lot of snacks. Curious to know where she's been getting all the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi around for the day.

episodes.title: Kagayaku hoshi no pawa! Chibichibi no henshin
episodes.plot: Usagi finds herself teamed up with Seiya for the annual school softball tournament. To make matters worse, Isagi becomes a target of Seiya's fans, who think she is hitting on him.

episodes.title: Kyofu e no Shotai! Usagi no yakan hiko
episodes.plot: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Using this knowledge, she sets a trap on a plane where the Three Lights are holding an in-flight event in order to get Usagi's attention.

episodes.title: Shimei to yuujou no hazama Seeraa senshi-tachi no tairitsu
episodes.plot: The Inner Senshi and the Starlights learn each others real identities, but distrust each other, Usagi and Seiya try to bring both groups together.

episodes.title: Akasareta shinjitsu seiya-tachi no kako
episodes.plot: Seiya and Usagi try to stay together after the Outer Senshi and the other two Starlights forbid them from seeing each other.

episodes.title: When a Light Butterfly Dances in the Air! Foresight of the New Wave
episodes.plot: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi but are unable to get in touch with them. As a last resort, the girls decide to enter a video game tournament where the winner gets a chance to speak with Taiki.

episodes.title: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol
episodes.plot: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of become an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest. But Minako is now thinking of turning down the offer, as she cannot ignore her duty as a Sailor Guardian.

episodes.title: Ubawareta ginzuishou! Kakyuu princess Shutsugen
episodes.plot: Usagi and her classmates are all busy preparing for the upcoming Juban School Festival. Meanwhile, Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon's true identity.

episodes.title: Ginga no seisen. Seeraa uoozu densetsu
episodes.plot: Princess Kakyu, the missing princess whom the Star Lights have long been searching for, finally appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.

episodes.title: Kakyu purinsesu shometsu! Gyarakushia korin
episodes.plot: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she has been unable to get in touch with Mamoru for the past several months. Meanwhile, the Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband their group.

episodes.title: Ginga horobirutoki! Seeraa senshi saigo no tatakai
episodes.plot: Princess Kakyu perishes after being defeated by Galaxia. Devastated, the Sailor Star Lights go after Galaxia to avenge their fallen princess. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon and the rest of the Guardians also prepare for their battle to protect the galaxy.

episodes.title: Ginga no shihaisha! Gyarakushia no kyoi
episodes.plot: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia's attack. The four Outer Guardians entrust Sailor Moon to the Star Lights while they try to stop Galaxia.

episodes.title: Kieyuku hoshiboshi! Uranusu-tachi no saigo
episodes.plot: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia. Despite Sailor Moon's desperate plea, the two continue their attack, forcing Sailor Moon and the Star Lights to retreat.

episodes.title: Kibo no Hikari! Ginga wo Kaketa saishu Kessen
episodes.plot: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos long ago. However, she has since become corrupt and has gone to conquer the galaxy herself.

episodes.title: Usagi's Love! The Moonlight Lights up the Galaxy
episodes.plot: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon's star seed, the Light of Hope finally reveals itself. Turning into a sword, the Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia, who is now fully consumed by Chaos.

episodes.title: Meeting of Fate! the Night where a Pegasus Flies
episodes.plot: During a solar eclipse, a mysterious floating circus tent appears in the sky over Tokyo. Meanwhile, Chibiusa is fascinated by a Pegasus who appears to her in a dream.

episodes.title: Super Transformations Again! Pegasus' Power
episodes.plot: When Reika returns from Africa, Usagi becomes concerned that she and Motoki are having relationship problems. Meanwhile, Tiger's Eye selects Reika as a target.

episodes.title: Protect a Mother's Dream! the New Attack for Double Moon
episodes.plot: When Ikuko is attacked by Hawk's Eye, Sailor Moon must once again rely on the mysterious Pegasus for assistance.

episodes.title: Capture the Pegasus! the Amazon's Trap
episodes.plot: When Hawk's Eye announces he has designed a system to trap Pegasus, Tiger's Eye approaches Naru with the intention of using her as bait.

episodes.title: A Couple Made for Each Other! Usagi and Mamoru's Love
episodes.plot: Chibiusa worries that Saori, a friend of Mamoru's from college, is romantically interested in him.

episodes.title: Artemis' Affair!? A Mysterious Kitten Appears!
episodes.plot: Rumors of Artemis' interest in other women spiral out of control after a small talking kitten appears, claiming that Artemis is her father.

episodes.title: Makoto's Friendship! A Girl Who Adores a Pegasus
episodes.plot: Usagi and Chibiusa are excited to discover that a best-selling book was written by an old friend of Makoto's.

episodes.title: Hearts That Communicate! Chibi-Usa and Pegasus
episodes.plot: Tiger's Eye targets Chibiusa's art teacher in the hopes of attacking Pegasus and finding his host.

episodes.title: Protect Mamoru! Jealousy of Usagi the Ninja
episodes.plot: Mamoru moves into the Hikawa Shrine after his apartment is wrecked, so Usagi assumes the guise of a ninja to protect his honor.

episodes.title: Forest of Illusion! Invitation of a Beautiful Fairy
episodes.plot: Chibi-Usa befriends a young man, an artist fixated on the existence of fairies, who is targeted by Fish-eye.

episodes.title: Drive to Heaven! Love Riding on the Car of Dreams
episodes.plot: Ami befriends Mamoru's colleague Natsumi, a widow who is trying to restore a classic car.

episodes.title: Try for the Best of Japan! the Worries of a Beautiful Girl Swordsman
episodes.plot: A young girl with dreams of being the strongest swordsman in Japan is targeted by Tiger's Eye.

episodes.title: Love Those Minis! The Fashionable Senshi
episodes.plot: Fisheye targets the fashion designer Yoshiki Usui, while Usagi hopes to persuade the designer to make her a wedding dress for free.

episodes.title: Storm of Love! Minako's Grand Two-Timing Plan
episodes.plot: Usagi and the girls are shocked to find out that Minako is dating two boys at the same time, but little does anymore realize that her suitors are Tiger's Eye and Hawk's Eye.

episodes.title: Mansion of Secrets! The Menu of Love to You
episodes.plot: The girls become interested in an apparently antisocial old woman after she takes Diana into her home.

episodes.title: Time to Believe the Pegasus! The Super Transformations of the Sailor Senshi
episodes.plot: Reports begin to flood in of a Pegasus wreaking havoc in the city. Meanwhile, a popular boy shows an interest in Chibiusa.

episodes.title: Sparkling Summer Days! Ami, the Girl in the Ocean Breeze
episodes.plot: Shingo develops a crush on Ami during a trip to the beach, while Tiger's Eye plot to seduce her.

episodes.title: Aim for the Prima! Usagi's Ballet
episodes.plot: Usagi begins ballet lesson in the hope of becoming a prima. Fisheye enrolls in the same class, and soon catches the eye of the instructor.

episodes.title: Holiday in Juuban! A Carefree Princess
episodes.plot: Usagi and Chibiusa are befriended by a mysterious foreign woman who accompanies them to the Azabu-Juuban summer festival. Unbeknownst to them, their acquaintance is a visiting princess who is being pursed by both her government and Hawk's Eye.

episodes.title: The Fated Partner? Makoto's Innocence
episodes.plot: Tiger's Eye plans to seduce the girls at a university dance party, while Makoto is immediately smitten with the charming stranger.

episodes.title: Shadows of Great Evil! The Trio Is Cornered
episodes.plot: While Fisheye targets Mamoru, Queen Nehellenia appears before the Amazon Trio and warns them that without the Golden Crystal, they will soon revert to their animal forms.

episodes.title: Mirror of Dreams! Final Stage of the Amazon Trio
episodes.plot: Fisheye discovers Chibiusa communicating with Pegasus, but refuses to cooperate with Zirconia's plans. As Hawk's Eye pursues Usagi for her Dream Mirror, Zirconia decides that the Amazon Trio have outlived their usefulness.

episodes.title: Amazoness! The Nightmare from Behind the Mirror
episodes.plot: Zirconia sends the Amazoness Quartet in search of the Golden Mirror, and their first target is Chibiusa's friend Momoko.

episodes.title: The Power Explodes! Ami's Song from the Heart
episodes.plot: Ami becomes obsessed with a tune she found on the internet, and writes lyrics to it. Meanwhile, VesVes of the Amazoness Quartet targets the tune's composer.

episodes.title: Burning Passion! Mars' Furious Deadly Attack
episodes.plot: Rei becomes a celebrity after being featured in a magazine article, and gains a dedicated young fan called Nanako.

episodes.title: A Dentist of Terror? Pallapalla's House
episodes.plot: When Usagi and ChibiUsa need to go to dentist, they try a new office which has opened in the neighborhood, but is it a trap?

episodes.title: Confrontation in Dreams! Minako and Makoto's Broken Friendship
episodes.plot: Makoto and Minako both fall for an attractive kindergarten teacher, but Minako's all-out attempts to ingratiate herself with him soon annoyed to Makoto.

episodes.title: Over the Fear! Jump to Freedom
episodes.plot: On the eve of his school's athletic meet, Kyuusuke worries about the box horse, the one obstacle he is unable to clear. JunJun approaches him with the intention of taking his Dream Mirror, and offers to be his coach.

episodes.title: Don't Lose Your Dreams! The Truth-Reflecting Mirror
episodes.plot: Usagi and Chibiusa befriend Kamoi, a starving young artist, who is later targeted by CereCere.

episodes.title: Pegasus Is Gone!? Swinging Friendships
episodes.plot: While VesVes targets an eccentric acquaintance of Chibiusa's who is trying to make a flying machine, Chibiusa worries that Pegasus does not trust her.

episodes.title: The Secret of Pegasus! The Handsome Guardian of the Dream World
episodes.plot: PallaPalla's magic causes Usagi and Chibiusa to switch ages, turning Usagi into a child and Chibiusa into a teenager. While Chibiusa is thrilled with her new body, she is distressed to discover that she can no longer call Pegasus.

episodes.title: Chibiusa's Little Rhapsody of Love
episodes.plot: As Chibiusa becomes even more enamoured of Helios, Usagi and her friends realise that she is in love, and are determined to discover the identity of her crush.

episodes.title: Dream to Be an Adult! The Amazoness' Bewilderment
episodes.plot: Usagi and her friends, along with the Amazoness Quartet, assist in the organization of a coming-of-age ceremony.

episodes.title: Coming Terror! The Dark Queen's Evil Approach
episodes.plot: Intent on escaping her mirror, Queen Nehellenia causes spider webs to appear all over the city, casting it into darkness.

episodes.title: The Center of the Darkness: Dead Moon Circus
episodes.plot: The Sailor Team infiltrate the Dead Moon Circus and are confronted by Zirconia.

episodes.title: Labyrinth of Mirrors! Chibi Moon Captured
episodes.plot: After being captured by Queen Nehellenia, Sailor Chibi Moon confronts the evil queen.

episodes.title: The Golden Crystal Appears! Nehellenia's Spell
episodes.plot: Queen Nehellenia forces Helios to return to his body and give up the Golden Crystal, allowing the evil queen to break free from her mirror.

episodes.title: Kurisutaru no Kagayaku Toki Utsukushiki Yume no Pawaa
episodes.plot: Queen Nehellenia, free from her mirror at last, prepares to use the power of the Golden Crystal.

episodes.title: Dreams Forever! Light Throughout the Sky
episodes.plot: Queen Nehellenia makes a desperate last stand as the Golden Crystal destroys the Dead Moon Circus.

episodes.title: Premonition of World's End? Mysterious New Senshi
episodes.plot: After she experiences apocalyptic visions, Rei is attacked by an extremely powerful monster that Sailor Moon cannot fight.

episodes.title: Rod of Love Is Born! Usagi's New Transformation
episodes.plot: A young girl is attacked by a Daimon, but Usagi is no longer able to transform into Sailor Moon, and the overpowered Sailor Team must one again rely on the mysterious new Sailor Senshi.

episodes.title: A Wonderful Beautiful Boy? The Secret of Haruka Tenoh
episodes.plot: Usagi and Minako become besotted with Haruka Tenou, an attractive and sophisticated boy...or so they believe.

episodes.title: Usagi's Idol! Graceful Genius Michiru
episodes.plot: Concerned that she is not intelligent enough for the sophisticated Mamoru, Usagi seeks advice from Michiru.

episodes.title: Protect the Pure Heart! A Three Way Battle
episodes.plot: Usagi's friend, Unazuki, is attacked by a Daimon and has her Pure Heart Crystal. After the crystal is dropped, Sailor Moon must race to find it and save Unazuki.

episodes.title: Leave It to the Moon for Love Aid
episodes.plot: Naru and Umino enter an Affection Contest in order to prove their love for each other, but find themselves targeted by a Daimon.

episodes.title: Cold Hearted Uranus? Makoto in Trouble
episodes.plot: Makoto is targeted by a Daimon, but manages to evade it. Haruka befriends Makoto in order to get close to her and her pure heart crystal.

episodes.title: The Labyrinth of Water! Ami the Targeted
episodes.plot: Ami's desire to avoid competition leads to her offending Michiru during a swimming race. Meanwhile, a Daimon selects Ami as her target.

episodes.title: Save Friends! Moon & Uranus Join Forces
episodes.plot: After Sailor Neptune is captured and possibly killed by Kaolinite, Sailor Moon and Sailor Uranus find themselves shackled together and are forced to reassess their attitudes toward each tower.

episodes.title: The Kindness of a Man! Yuuichirou, Heartbroken by Rei?
episodes.plot: Worried by Rei's increasingly intensive meditation, Yuuichirou becomes concerned that she has fallen for another man. When he sees her with Haruka, he is convinced that she is Rei's new suitor.

episodes.title: Retire from the Sailor Senshi!? Minako's Concerns
episodes.plot: Minako becomes despondent about her life as a Sailor Senshi. Meanwhile, an old friend of hers is attacked by Daimon.

episodes.title: Usagi in Tears! Glass Shoes for Her Birthday
episodes.plot: Usagi is furious when Mamoru forgets her birthday. When Mamoru buys her an expensive pair of glass slippers to make up for it, he fails to realize that they have been implanted with a Daimon's Egg.

episodes.title: The Pure Heart Stolen! Usagi's Biggest Crisis
episodes.plot: With her transformation brooch stolen and Tuxedo Mask kidnapped, Usagi goes to face Kaolinite in a showdown at Tokyo Tower.

episodes.title: The Arrival of the Tiny Pretty Soldier
episodes.plot: When a drummer is targeted at the Azabujuban Festival, Sailor Moon and Sailor Mars receive assistance from an unexpected source.

episodes.title: Seeking Friends! Chibi Moon's Actions
episodes.plot: Chibiusa searches for friends in the twentieth century, and becomes intrigued by Tomasaburou, a young practitioner of the tea ceremony.

episodes.title: Wanting More Power! Mako-Chan's Lost Path
episodes.plot: Frustrated at her inability to fight enemies alone, Makoto goes to train in the mountains with the help of a Buddhist monk.

episodes.title: The Bond of Destiny! The Distant Days of Uranus
episodes.plot: When an old acquaintance is targeted by the Death Busters, Haruka recalls how she first met Michiru and awakened as Sailor Uranus.

episodes.title: Art Is an Explosion of Love! Chibi Usa's First Love
episodes.plot: Chibiusa develops a crush on Masanori, the young sculptor in her art class. However, Masanori seems more interested in Michiru.

episodes.title: Usagi's Dance, in Time to a Waltz
episodes.plot: Usagi and her friends are invited to a party for foreign university students, but her enthusiasm is tempered by the knowledge that most of the conversation will be in English.

episodes.title: A Time of Shock! True Identities Revealed to One Another
episodes.plot: Minako realizes that she is the only one of the Sailor Team not to have been targeted for her Pure Heart Crystal, and takes increasingly absurd measures to prove her purity.

episodes.title: Death of Uranus and Neptune? The Coming of Talisman
episodes.plot: Haruka and Michiru are contacted by Eudial, who claims to have found the owner of a talisman.

episodes.title: The Grail's Divine Power! Moon's Double Transformation
episodes.plot: With Sailor Uranus and Sailor Neptune dying, Sailor Moon must race to get the talisman back from Eudial.

episodes.title: Who Is the True Messiah? Chaos of Light and Darkness
episodes.plot: Usagi and her friends go to the park to watch a movie being filmed. While Chibiusa befriends the mysterious Hortau, the filming is disrupted by Mimete.

episodes.title: A House Full of Evil Presence! The Secret of the Beautiful Girl Hotaru
episodes.plot: Usagi accompanies Chibiusa on a visit to her new friend Hotaru's house, while Mimete targets a famous manga artist.

episodes.title: Crazy for Celebrities! Mimet in Doubt
episodes.plot: Mimete infiltrates an idol competition in order to get close to her target, Jinta Araki. But when she qualifies for the final round, she considers quitting the Death Busters.

episodes.title: Shadow of Silence!? The Pale Glimmer of a Firefly
episodes.plot: Hotaru over-exerts herself and is taken to hospital, while Mimete targets a television actor for his Pure Heart Crystal.

episodes.title: Sunny Skies After a Storm! A Friendship Dedicated to Hotaru
episodes.plot: Chibiusa invites Hotaru on a picnic at a local botanical garden, not realizing that the resident botanist is the next target of the Death Busters.

episodes.title: Higher, Stronger! Cheers by Usagi
episodes.plot: Usagi and Chibiusa accompany Hotaru to a sports stadium to deliver a fan letter to the famous athlete Shun Hayase.

episodes.title: The Battle in a Demonic Dimension! The Sailor Senshi's Bet
episodes.plot: When Mimete decides to help in the production of a Daimon, she accidentally creates an anomaly that fractures the dimensions inside the Tomoe residence, trapping Chibiusa and Hotaru.

episodes.title: Awakening of the Messiah of Silence? Stars of Destiny
episodes.plot: Chibiusa invites Hotaru to a show at the planetarium, while Mimete plans to steal the Pure Heart Crystal of the DJ Thomas Harris.

episodes.title: Invasion from an Alternate Dimension! The Mystery of Mugen Academy
episodes.plot: After Hotaru and her father disappear from their house, the Sailor Senshi infiltrate Mugen Academy, suspicious that it is connected to the Death Busters.

episodes.title: A Mystic Flower That Steals Hearts! The Third Witch, Telulu
episodes.plot: Tellu opens a store selling Telluns, plants designed to remove Pure Heart Crystals. Meanwhile, Hotaru wakes up, confused, in the Messiah of Silence's chamber.

episodes.title: Believe in Love! Ami, a Kind-Hearted Soldier
episodes.plot: With the latest round of national Patrice exams being held at Mugen Academy, the Sailor Team infiltrate the school and Ami encounters her academic rival, Yui Bidou.

episodes.title: Shadows of Destruction! The Awakening of the Messiah of Silence
episodes.plot: Cyprine, the last of the Witches 5, summons Mugen Academy's students in order to remove their Pure Heart Crystal, while Kaolinite targets Chibiusa.

episodes.title: The Horror of the Approaching Shadow! Eight Soldiers in Tough Battle
episodes.plot: The Sailor Senshi approach Mugen Academy in order to save Chibiusa and defeat the Death Busters, while Mistress 9 plans to steal the Holy Grail from Sailor Moon.

episodes.title: A Bright Shooting Star! Saturn and the Messiah
episodes.plot: Mistress 9 steals the Holy Grail, allowing Pharaoh 90 to pass through the portal to Earth. The fate of the world rests in the hands of the Senshi of Ruin, Sailor Saturn.

episodes.title: A New Life! Time for Separation of the Destined Stars
episodes.plot: The Death Busters have been defeated, but Hotaru is reduced to infancy and Sailor Pluto's whereabouts are still unknown. Meanwhile, Haruka and Michiru have one last mission before they leave Azabu-Juban.

episodes.title: Self-Awareness as a Soldier! Strength Lies in the Pure Heart
episodes.plot: While Chibiusa prepares to return to the thirtieth century, a surviving Daimon Egg hatches in the ruins of Mugen Academy.

episodes.title: Mûn fukkatsu! Nazo no eirian shutsugen
episodes.plot: Two mysterious aliens show up in town and Luna and Artemis restore Usagi's memories of being Sailor Moon.

episodes.title: Ai to seigi yue! Sêrâ senshi futatabi
episodes.plot: Ali and En target a TV company who have invited Ami, Rei, Makoto, Minako and Naru for auditions. Luna and Artemis are forced to consider restoring the memories of the rest of the Sailor Team.

episodes.title: Shiroi bara wa dare ni? Tsukikage no naito tôjô
episodes.plot: Makoto is forced to donate blood after her childhood friend is injured by a Cardian. Meanwhile, the mysterious Moonlight Knight appears in the midst of battle to help the Sailor Team.

episodes.title: Usagi no kiki! Tiara sadô sezu
episodes.plot: Usagi visits the new Virtual Reality Theatre with Mamoru unaware that it is the next target for Ali and En's energy harvesting operations.

episodes.title: Atarashiki henshin! Usagi pawâ appu
episodes.plot: A powerful Cardian attacks a cherry blossom viewing party, and Sailor Moon is suddenly unable to fight it.

episodes.title: Nerawareta enji! Vînasu daikatsuyaku
episodes.plot: Minako befriends a Kindergarten student who is a fan of Sailor Moon.

episodes.title: Mamoru to Usagi no bebîshittâ sôdô
episodes.plot: Ali and En are now targeting babies as a source of energy. When a baby's mother is attacked and in the hospital Mamoru and Usagi have to look after the child.

episodes.title: Bunkasai wa watashi no tame!? Rei joô nesshô
episodes.plot: Rei prepares for her role as the star attraction of T·A Academy for Girls' Culture Festival unaware that Ali and En have decided to target the event.

episodes.title: Tsukikage wa Seijûrô? Moeru Mako-chan
episodes.plot: Makoto develops a crush on Seijuro while Ami investigates the possibility that he is the Moonlight Knight.

episodes.title: Mamoru no kisu ubae! An no Shirayuki-hime sakusen
episodes.plot: The gang helps Mamoru put on a play of "Snow White".

episodes.title: Hôkago ni goyôjin! Nerawareta Usagi
episodes.plot: Usagi and Natsumi are given detention, then abandoned as Haruna goes on a date. Meanwhile, Ali is frustrated by a Cardian that refuses to obey him.

episodes.title: Surechigau ai no kokoro! Ikari no Makaiju
episodes.plot: With the Makaiju seemingly close to death, Ali and En step up their energy-harvesting operation but are horrified to find that the tree is not responding.

episodes.title: Mezameru shinjitsu no ai! Makaiju no himitsu
episodes.plot: The Sailor Team fight to save Usagi and Mamoru from the enraged Makaiju, while Ali and En are shocked to discover the real identity of Sailor Moon.

episodes.title: Tenshi? Akuma? Sora kara kita nazo no shôjo
episodes.plot: A strange child, claiming to be called Usagi Tsukino, appears from the sky and demands the Silver Crystal from Usagi.

episodes.title: Usagi daishokku! Mamoru no zekkô sengen
episodes.plot: Mamoru begins to experience bizarre visions, which prompt him to break up with Usagi. Meanwhile, Berthier begins to spread Dark Power via a cosmetics store.

episodes.title: Senshi no yûjô! Sayonara Ami-chan
episodes.plot: Ami considers moving to Germany in order to study medicine. Meanwhile, Berthier hijacks an ice cream business in order to spread Dark Power.

episodes.title: Onna wa tsuyoku utsukushiku! Rei no shin hissatsu waza
episodes.plot: Koan targets the Hikawa Shrine, as Rei's Grandfather launches a radical new scheme to drum up business for the shrine.

episodes.title: Ginzuishô o motomete! Chibiusa no himitsu
episodes.plot: Rubeus tries to locate Chibiusa by creating a huge thunderstorm, hoping her fear of thunder will cause her energy to peak.

episodes.title: Koi no ronsô! Minako to Makoto ga tairitsu
episodes.plot: While Makoto and Minako get into a heated argument, Calaveras and Petz take over a business to spread Dark Power.

episodes.title: Usagi no oyagokoro? Karê na sankaku kankei
episodes.plot: Usagi volunteers to make a curry with Chibiusa for a party at her school, but the local supermarket becomes the latest target for Calaveras and Petz.

episodes.title: Umi yo shima yo bakansu yo! Senshi no kyûsoku
episodes.plot: The Senshi go on vacation to a remote island, where ChibiUsa makes a new friend.

episodes.title: Chibiusa o mamore! 10 senshi no daigekisen
episodes.plot: Wiseman predicts that Chibiusa will appear, so Rubeus sends the Spectre Sisters to capture her, leading to a battle with the Sailor Team.

episodes.title: Mezame yo nemureru bishôjo! Mamoru no kunô
episodes.plot: Sailor Moon is attacked by a Droid who locks her in a nightmare, and the only one who can wake her is Tuxedo Mask.

episodes.title: Ai no honô no taiketsu! Mâzu vs Kôan
episodes.plot: Koan makes a final bid to kill Chibiusa, convinced she can win Rubeus' heart. However, she faces unexpected opposition from Sailor Mars, and is shocked to be rejected by Rubeus.

episodes.title: Yûjô no tame! Ami to Beruche gekitotsu
episodes.plot: Ami enters an international chess tournament at the Chess Tower, and discovers that Berthier has targeted the building.

episodes.title: Cold Hearted Rubeus! The Four Sisters of Sorrow
episodes.plot: Spurred on by Wiseman, Rubeus sends Calaveras and Petz on a suicide mission to kill the Sailor Senshi and Chibiusa.

episodes.title: UFO shutsugen! Sarawareta S senshi-tachi
episodes.plot: After discovering that he is to be withdrawn, Rubeus resorts to desperate measures to kill Chibiusa, and succeeds in abducting the Sailor Team.

episodes.title: Defeat Rubeus! Decisive Battle in Space
episodes.plot: With the rest of the Sailor Team captured by Rubeus, Sailor Moon plans a rescue, and is taken aboard the UFO for a final showdown.

episodes.title: Mysterious New Soldier, Pluto Appears
episodes.plot: Chibiusa becomes ill suddenly, her mind invaded by the power of the Evil Black Crystal. Sailor Pluto, a Sailor Senshi from the future, appears to the Sailor Team to offer her help.

episodes.title: Black Magic! Invasion of Esmeraude
episodes.plot: Esmeraude begins her attack on twentieth century Tokyo, attempting to nurture a Dark Henge on a Negative Point inside a cake shop.

episodes.title: Thoughts the Same! Usagi and Mamoru in Love Again
episodes.plot: While Esmeraude targets the latest craze, promise rings, Usagi has a dream that may explain why Mamoru has been acting coldly towards her.

episodes.title: Venus Minako's Nurse Mayhem
episodes.plot: Esmeraude releases a virulent strain of influenza into Tokyo, and only Minako and Chibiusa seem unaffected.

episodes.title: Artemis' Adventure. The Invaded Animal Kingdom
episodes.plot: After Luna wounds his pride one too many times, Artemis sets out on a mission to prove his worth, and stumbles upon Esmeraude's latest plot.

episodes.title: Dreadful Illusion! Ami All Alone
episodes.plot: Esmeraude attacks a local cram school, altering the behavior of the students there. When Ami investigates, she is subjected to a series of hallucinations by Esmeraude's Droid.

episodes.title: The Dark Gate Opens? Grade School Targeted!
episodes.plot: Esmeraude attacks two targets simultaneously, creating chaos in Chibiusa's school, and the Sailor Team face off against her two Droids.

episodes.title: Journey to the Future. Battle in the Corridor of Time
episodes.plot: The Sailor Team accompany Chibiusa into the Space-Time Corridor, where they are attacked by Esmeraude and her Droid.

episodes.title: The Shocking Future! Dimande's Dark Ambition
episodes.plot: The Sailor Team arrive in the thirtieth century with Chibiusa, where they are met by King Endymion, Mamoru's future self.

episodes.title: Wiseman's Dark Hand. Destroy Chibi-Usa!
episodes.plot: Chibiusa falls under the control of Wiseman, while Esmeraude resolves to kill Sailor Moon and win Prince Dimande's heart by any means necessary.

episodes.title: The Birth of Black Lady, the Queen of Darkness
episodes.plot: Chibi-Usa is kidnapped by Wiseman. Who brainwashes her into thinking her parents don't love her and transforms her into a villain called Black Lady.

episodes.title: Saphir Dies! Wiseman's Trap
episodes.plot: Saphir discovers that Wiseman has been plotting against the Black Moon Clan, and races to warn his brother of the betrayal.

episodes.title: Believe in Love and the Future! Usagi's Determination
episodes.plot: The Sailor Senshi go inside the growing Evil Black Crystal fragment, where Sailor Moon finally confronts Prince Dimande.

episodes.title: Hikari to yami no saishu kessen! Mirai he chikau ai
episodes.plot: Sailor Moon faces Black Lady, as Wiseman prepares to fire the power of the Evil Black Crystal through the Dark Gate and destroy the Earth.

episodes.title: Usagi-tachi no ketsui! Atarashiki tatakai no jokyoku
episodes.plot: The Sailor Team present a preview of the forthcoming season, and debate the prospect of selecting a new leader.

episodes.title: Crybaby Usagi's Magnificent Transformation
episodes.plot: Usagi goes from being a typical middle school girl to being a super hero when she saves a talking cat.

episodes.title: Punish Them! the House of Fortune Is the Monster Mansion
episodes.plot: The boys at Usagi's school are misbehaving, and it may have something to do with the mysterious new fortune teller in town.

episodes.title: Mysterious Sleeping Illness! Protect the Girl's Hearts in Love
episodes.plot: After Haruna and Naru fall prey to a new disease that causes permanent sleep, Usagi investigates the late-night radio show Midnight Zero.

episodes.title: Usagi ga oshiemasu! Surimu ni naruhô
episodes.plot: A new gym which promises incredible weight loss in just a few days falls under suspicion from Usagi and Luna.

episodes.title: A Monster's Scent! Chanela Steals Love
episodes.plot: Usagi tries to convince her parents to let her adopt Luna, but her brother Shingo has a great disliking of Luna and slight ailurophobia. Later, a mysterious new pet store opens in town which is selling strange new creatures that put Shingo and everyone else who gets one into a hypnotic trance.

episodes.title: Protect the Melody of Love! Usagi Is a Cupid
episodes.plot: Usagi befriends Yusuke Amade, a jazz musician who is being followed by a Youma, and helps him confess to the woman he loves.

episodes.title: Usagi Learns a Lesson! The Road to Stardom Is Tough
episodes.plot: Usagi, Naru and Umino aim to become celebrities, just as Jadeite initiates a plan to enslave people with dreams of fame.

episodes.title: Is the Genius Girl a Monster? Brainwashing School of Terror
episodes.plot: Usagi and Luna meet Ami Mizuno, a girl of genius level intelligence. While Luna is suspicious that she may be an enemy, Usagi instead tries to make a friend out of her.

episodes.title: Usagi's Misfortune! Watch Out for the Rushing Clocks
episodes.plot: The Dark Kingdom creates chaos in Tokyo by distributing cursed clocks that alter the time perception of their owners.

episodes.title: Norowareta basu! Honô no senshi Mâzu tôjô
episodes.plot: While investigating the case of a disappearing bus, Usagi meets Rei Hino, a shrine maiden with unusual powers.

episodes.title: Usagi vs. Rei? A Nightmare in Dreamland
episodes.plot: The girls investigate a new amusement park, where people have allegedly disappeared.

episodes.title: I Want a Boyfriend, Too! A Trap on a Luxury Cruise Ship
episodes.plot: Rei wins tickets for a romantic cruise and asks Ami to join her, prompting jealousy from Usagi. However, the cruise is actually part of a plot by Jadeite.

episodes.title: Onna no ko wa danketsu yo! Jedaito no saigo
episodes.plot: Having incurred the wrath of Queen Beryl, Jadeite is told to kill the Sailor Senshi or face death, so he challenges them to a final showdown.

episodes.title: Arata naru kyôteki, Nefuraito ma no monshô
episodes.plot: Nephrite is appointed as Jadeite's successor and begins selecting individual targets for energy, the first one being Naru's friend Rui.

episodes.title: Usagi aseru! Rei-chan hatsu dêto
episodes.plot: Rei falls for Mamoru and persuades him to go on a date with her, whilst Nephrite targets the caretaker of a local park.

episodes.title: Dream of a White Dress! Usagi Becomes a Bride
episodes.plot: Usagi decides to enter a home-made wedding dress contest, while her home economics teacher is targeted by Nephrite.

episodes.title: Is Usagi a Model? The Focus of the Monster Camera
episodes.plot: Nephrite targets a gifted young photographer, while Usagi tries to achieve her dream of becoming a model.

episodes.title: Shingo's Innocent Love! A Sorrowful French Doll
episodes.plot: Shingo upsets his friend Mika, whose famous doll-making skills make her the next target for Nephrite's energy gathering.

episodes.title: Usagi kangeki! Takishido Kamen no rabu reta
episodes.plot: Nephrite plans to trap Sailor Moon by sending fake love letters from Tuxedo Mask to all of the girls in Azabu-Juuban, but his plan inadvertently draws the attention of Naru.

episodes.title: The Summer! The Ocean! Our Youth! And a Ghost Too
episodes.plot: Usagi, Ami, Rei, and Luna take a vacation in order to train, but the hotel they have booked is haunted by a strange phenomenon.

episodes.title: Protect the Children's Dreams! Friendship Linked by Anime
episodes.plot: An animator working on an anime film is attacked!

episodes.title: Romance Under the Moon! Usagi's First Kiss
episodes.plot: Usagi, Tuxedo Mask, and Nephrite all infiltrate an embassy reception in search of the princess and the Silver Crystal.

episodes.title: Nagareboshi ni negai o! Naru-chan no jun'ai
episodes.plot: With Naru now infatuated with Nephrite's alias Masato Sanjoin, Usagi is powerless to stop her friend from being used by the increasingly desperate general.

episodes.title: Naru-chan gôkyô! Nefuraito ai no shi
episodes.plot: Still in love with Nephrite, Naru becomes an unwilling tool in the power struggle between Nephrite and Zoisite.

episodes.title: Koi-suru kairiki shôjo, Jupitâ-chan
episodes.plot: While Zoisite is sent on a mission to retrieve the seven Rainbow Crystals, Usagi meets Makoto Kino, a tough new student.

episodes.title: Bring a Smile to Naru's Face! Usagi's Friendship
episodes.plot: Naru is still devastated after the death of Nephrite, so Usagi and Umino take her on a trip to Yokohama to cheer her up.

episodes.title: Love for Ami? A Boy Who Can Predict the Future
episodes.plot: Ami meets Ryo Urawa, a clairvoyant who has a crush on her. However, Urawa's power makes him aware that he will soon be transformed into a Youma by Zoisite.

episodes.title: Illustrations of Love, Are Usagi and Mamoru Getting Close?
episodes.plot: Usagi and Mamoru are asked to model for the reclusive painter Yumemi Yumeno, who is unexpectedly targeted by Zoisite.

episodes.title: Daikonsen! Gucha gucha koi no shikaku kankei
episodes.plot: Makoto falls for Motoki, only to discover that he already has a girlfriend, Reika. Makoto and Usagi face a moral dilemma when they find out that she is considering moving to Africa.

episodes.title: Ojii-chan ranshin, rei-chan no kiki
episodes.plot: After fighting off an attack by Zoisite, Rei's Grandfather takes on an apprentice and begins acting strangely.

episodes.title: Koisarete owarete! Runa no saiakuno hi
episodes.plot: Luna is rescued from an angry gang of alley cats, by an overweight feline with a crush on her. The cat is targeted by Zoicite after he is found to be one of the Rainbow Youmas.

episodes.title: Umino no kesshin! Naru-chan wa boku ga mamoru
episodes.plot: Umino misinterprets Usagi's advice on seducing Naru, and begins to adopt the persona of Tuxedo Mask.

episodes.title: Saigo no Sêrâ senshi, vînasu tôjô
episodes.plot: The Sailor Senshi and Tuxedo Mask pursue a fake Sailor Moon, only to fall into Zoisite and Kunzite's trap.

episodes.title: Hikari kagayaku ginzuishô! Tsuki no purinsesu tôjô
episodes.plot: Mamoru is forced to confront Zoisite in a duel over the Rainbow Crystals, but Usagi inadvertently becomes involved.

episodes.title: Yomigaeru kioku! Usagi to mamoru no kako
episodes.plot: The appearance of the Silver Crystal triggers memories of Usagi and Mamoru's previous incarnations in the Silver Millennium.

episodes.title: Usagi konran! Takishîdo kamen wa aku?
episodes.plot: Minako tries to cheer Usagi up by taking her to a hair salon, leading to the discovery that Tuxedo Mask is still alive, but now very different.

episodes.title: Mezase purinsesu? Usagi no chintokkun
episodes.plot: Determined to become more like the princess she is supposed to be, Usagi decides to enlist in Countess Rose's Princess Seminar.

episodes.title: Yuki yo yama yo yûjô yo! Yappari yôma mo yo
episodes.plot: Usagi and her friends visit the Moonlight Course skiing resort, unaware that Kunzite has sabotaged the Moon Princess Contest in order to unmask Sailor Moon.

episodes.title: Yôma to pea!? Hyôjô no joô Mako-chan
episodes.plot: Kunzite uses the Silver Millennium's most popular sport, figure skating, to set a trap for Sailor Moon, but ends up drawing in Makoto instead.

episodes.title: Mizuumi no densetsu yôkai! Usagi kazoku no kizuna
episodes.plot: Usagi and her family visit a hot springs resort, while Endymion is sent to resurrect an ancient legendary monster.

episodes.title: Mô koikara nigenai! Ami to mamoru taiketsu
episodes.plot: Ami is reunited with Urawa when he foresees Endymion's plot to kidnap the former Rainbow Crystal holders and create the ultimate Youma.

episodes.title: S Vînasu no kako, Minako no hiren
episodes.plot: Kunzite probes Sailor V's connection with the Sailor Senshi by targeting Katarina, an old acquaintance of Minako's.

episodes.title: Usagi ga koritsu? S senshi-tachi no ô-genka
episodes.plot: Kunzite and his Youma investigate the rumors of a rift between Sailor Moon and the other Sailor Senshi.

episodes.title: Usagi's Awakening! A Message from the Distant Past
episodes.plot: The Sailor Senshi discover a portal to the Dark Kingdom, and are confronted by Kunzite. In the midst of battle they are transported to the Moon, where they are faced with visions of their past lives.

episodes.title: The Sailor Soldiers Die! The Tragic Final Battle
episodes.plot: After defeating Kunzite, regaining their past memories, and discovering the Dark Kingdom's hideout the Sailor Senshi head for the enemy, but they must prepare for the ultimate sacrifice.

episodes.title: Usagi's Memory Is Eternal! A New Rebirth
episodes.plot: With her friends killed, Sailor Moon is transported inside the Dark Kingdom to face Queen Beryl and the brainwashed Prince Endymion.
